title: Conformational studies of biaryl-bridged seven-membered lactones with a quaternary carbon center
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25663-25668
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04703F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yu Zhang, Yueyang Yu, Xiaoqiang Ma, Xiaofei Zhao, Jialin Huang, Depeng Zhao
Here, conformations of a series of 7,7-disubstituted-dibenzo[b,d]oxepin-6(7H)-ones were studied and we found that the stable conformers all favor to place the larger group in the axial position instead of the equatorial position.
